metadata.title: CVE-2016-4324 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in LibreOffice before 5.1.4 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted RTF file, related tostylesheet and superscript tokens.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4324` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-opensymbol - 2:102.7+LibO5.1.4-0ubuntu1
gir1.2-lokdocview-0.1 - 1:5.1.4-0ubuntu1
libreoffice - 1:5.1.4-0ubuntu1
libreoffice-avmedia-backend-gstreamer - 1:5.1.4-0ubuntu1
